post.body: Yuck. Sorry to hear about the layoffs.
The "poor mountaineer" part sounds like the Beverly Hillbillies theme -- not sure about the rest.
Oh crap - did you remember to Febreeze your jacket? I was going to remind you.
I guess either that means "consuming oneself" or is a rude term for someone who drives a really sissy-looking car.
Dude, can I borrow your highlighter?
Although I am in need of a complex orgasm, I do not think you can help me. ... Thank God for Internet, mail order.
My mental flash: You sitting calmy by CM. Strangely, U R wearing spiked collar, leash. Made me feel funny in my pants. Sorry.
I understand we have a birthday girl in the flock. I hope it's a great one. And pls continue to kick butt on scholastically.
... but I usually drink the diet stuff, which probably makes a difference. REAL Coke may in fact be better than real Pepsi.
I have too tasted Coca Cola. It's a lot like Pepsi, but with stronger undertones of Listerine.
@todderickv I'm also a member of the My Dad Beat Prostate Cancer Club.
Well, you know the particulars of the situation better than I (and the personalities). I'm sure you will pick the best method.
... plus a lenghty & critical e-mail just has too much "Bad doggie! Bad doggie! Bad, bad doggie!" stink to it.
Probably in person. That way I could explain the choices I made, or get elaboration if I need it.
Glad to hear it!
As a show of sympathy, I will stay my hand of vengeance for you getting "SOM" stuck in my head. For now.
Ah, those are fun. Nothing like trying to polish someone else's mess right before a deadline. You have my sympathies.
May I request that the Report Card be sent to my gmail, just so I can admire the handiwork?
On the lighter side, that IS good news. I don't suppose there's a link to a website with lots of pics?
Still sorry. It seems like something like this always happens over the holidays, to someone.
My fave (fennec) FOX comment: "WHY DO YOU CANCEL ALL THE GOOD SHOWS, FOX? F**k you. You canceled Firefly!"
Oh, that's right. Maybe he thinks you're so awesome, he has to pause for breathe whenever he mentions your name?
I think you should Get On This "right away." Everyone could "use" More Excellence! This is a "Priority!" Thank-you!
I think I am going to start Demanding Excellence. It seems to yield Good Results.
I think Your Employer should pay for you to make a visit to this Top Media Concern.
Anyway, that is an Impressive Letter. Does Mr. Sperm know the Company he represents is a Boy Band? (I won't reveal Which One.)
I have reviewed Mr. Sperm's letter. (Actually, I think the sig looks more like a sea serpent with a curly tail, swimming left)
I read your blog. What to say when people tell you the chis are cute: "That's what keeps me from killing them."
Good for Jake.
"Buck" should be "but" at the beginning of that last tweet. ('Twas a Freudian slip too complicated to explain here.)
... buck at least it wasn't a conspiracy against me. All the other call participants were left sitting on the line limp-dicked too.
Found host for conf. call is traveling this wk & couldn't call in enable the call - too minor a detail in her sched to tell the rest of us.
... I'm on the verge of sending some colleagues a very passive-aggressive e-mail, dammit!
... did they cancel these or change the time/date/call-in number without telling me? WTF, people?
OK, this project is s'posed to have a status conf. call every other Wed. at 3:30. This is the 2nd consec. time I'm the only one who showed.
Okay, I think I've caught up with all my tweeting for today. Please go on about your business.
Something about December makes me extra lascivious. Some weird hormonal peaking takes place this month.
So I had a sardine sandwich with mustard instead. I was having a weird jones for that anyway. And it was the only other food in the place.
So no pizza was had last night. "It's not delivery -- it's deprivation!"
Say, has anyone heard anything about some music video called "Shinin' on Me"? Apparently the young people these days really dig it.
RIP Bettie Page. Dec. 11, 2008.
I think my neighbor across the way has taken up playing the drums. Stand by for further developments.
Note: "Wuv" is pronounced "heart."
2008 Xmas shopping: BEGAN 12-15-08 8:30 p.m., FINISHED 12-15-08 10:00 p.m. - Borders gift cards and Amazon.com, I wuv you. WUV you.
Meeting scheduled for 90 mins., ran 2 hrs. Drowned in a sea of buzzwords. Answer to question: "So what should I do next?" changed ev. 2 mins
Luckily, I work in a fast-paced, dynamic, ever-changing environment, so "next week" is like "some time in the next century" to me.
If only the nations of this world could settle their differences via games of dodgeball, Bush would have been Best President EVAR.
... and he does! I just saw a video, and if I'd been in Bush's place, BOTH shoes would have taken me right in the face.
Internet comment about thrown shoe: "Say what you will about Bush, but that wily monkey has mad ninja reflexes."
There should be a law that no meeting should exceed 30 mins. Or one hour, tops. I have a 90-min. one at 3:00 that I'm dreading. TEDIOUS.
Another MUST: Going to Connecticut to hang w/ E. Coast Internet homies in mid-January. MUST book plane, hotel soon.
My female co-workers look really hot today. CURSE YOU, my mysterious December hormonal upsurge. CURSE YOU.
MUST remember to get work "Secret Santa" gift tonight, since the exchange is tomorrow. Prob need to start general gift shopping too.
I now have the chorus from "Shine on Me" stuck in my head. Gotdammit! @superbadgirl , my vengeance shall be one of excruciating cruelty.
Srsly, some of you have been hit hard in the past year. But you've shown how tough you are. I hope next year is your best ever (so far).
I'm signing off and may not be back on the Internet until Dec. 30th, so now I offer holiday cheer and goodwill to all Twitterkind!
http://tinyurl.com/6okwnm Gift-wrapping service does the job just like I'd do, but without the bother.
I guess I do have sort of a grievance that Firefly was canceled, come to think of it. DARN YOU! DARN YOU ALL TO HECK! /Censored Heston
... so my grievances are all pretty much vicarious. I wish you the attainment of a terrible vengeance for all of yours.
Merry Festivus, everyone! Although I've seen many a friend get slapped with the shit-stick, this year has been pretty decent for me ...
Oh, eff. Wrapping paper.
An atypically well-stocked refrigerator and pantry. Eggnog. Jack Daniels. Gifts to wrap. What else do I need at home tonight?
